meta.title: OAuth2 got easy
meta.summary: Oauth2 support exists in Eclipse Vert.x since version 3.2.0. The implementation follows the principles that rule the whole vert.x ecosystem.

meta.title: Vert.x featuring Continuous Delivery with Jenkins and Ansible
meta.summary: This blog entry describes an approach to adopt Continuous Delivery for Vert.x applications using Jenkins and Ansible by taking advantage of the Jenkins Job DSL and Ansible plugins.

meta.title: Centralized logging for Vert.x applications using the ELK stack
meta.summary: This post entry describes a solution to achieve centralized logging of Vert.x applications using the ELK stack (Logstash, Elasticsearch, and Kibana).

meta.title: Vert.x Blueprint Tutorials
meta.summary: The Vert.x Blueprint project aims to provide guidelines to Vert.x users to implement various applications such as message-based applications and microservices.

meta.title: Vertx 3 and Keycloak tutorial
meta.summary: With the upcoming release of Vert.x 3.3 securing your application with Keycloak is even easier than before.

meta.title: Vert.x 3 and Azure cloud platform tutorial
meta.summary: Vert.x 3.2.1 applications can quickly be deployed on Microsoft Azure. Deployment is independent of your build so it is all about configuration.
